alert.note: Alert for Columbia; Lycoming; Sullivan (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 15 at 8:15PM EDT until July 15 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Columbia County in central Pennsylvania... East central Lycoming County in north central Pennsylvania... Central Sullivan County in north central Pennsylvania... * Until 900 PM EDT. * At 814 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Biggertown, moving north at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jamison City, Waller, Biggertown, Central, Muncy Valley, Benton, Dushore, Laporte, Stillwater, Forksville and Eagles Mere. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Very heavy rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
